originalText.text: I am very happy to share 5 STARS for Brownstone Professional Services!  They have been so helpful, responsive, and friendly to me over the years.  From the property manager, super, to the wonderful admin staff and support service team - they've been there for me every time!  I'm very grateful to be a tenant and know that they are there to help me if anything comes up.  I highly recommend living in a property they manage!  ðŸ™ŒðŸ˜Š-Glen

originalText.text: If I could give 0 stars I would.  We rented from them for 2+ years. Worst company Iâ€™ve ever dealt with.  The property manager Shazad screamed in my girlfriends face and was not man enough to apologize.  Iâ€™m sorry your office job was so hard and stressful.  Do better.  Roaches and mice in the apt and building, trash piles up in hallway, pickups are missed weekly.  I filed daily 311 complaints and eventually ended up in direct contact with Nyc dept of health as a result of substandard sanitary conditions.  I alerted management often and politely and was met with nothing but disrespect and lack of action.  Avoid at all costs.
